## 题目名称：RSA

### 解题思路：

已知`n`和`e`等于有公钥，无法取巧，只能因式分解`n`，求出`p`、`q`。
使用软件`yafu`解出`p`、`q`，再由`p`、`q`、`e`算出`d`，最后获取明文`m=pow(c,d,n)`

```
PS C:\Users\Jam\Downloads\yafu-1.34> .\yafu-x64.exe "factor(@)" -batchfile n.txt

=== Starting work on batchfile expression ===
factor()
=============================================
fac: factoring 
fac: using pretesting plan: normal
fac: no tune info: using qs/gnfs crossover of 95 digits
div: primes less than 10000
fmt: 1000000 iterations
Total factoring time = 0.3339 seconds


***factors found***

PRP617 = 
PRP617 = 

ans = 1
```
答案：`flag{d1fference_between_p_And_q_1s_t00_5mall}`
